languages.text: "Лик Ульфара озаряет пожар восходящего солнца, столь жаркое пламя сияет — аж больно смотреть. Но стоит пожару утихнуть, хоть на секунду, и тут же подложка из блеклой серости и мерзко-зеленой дымки окутывает его плечи. Никто вокруг этого не замечает..." {n}Кассия взмахивает ладонью, сбрасывая невидимую шаль с собственных плеч.{/n} "Но я вижу".

traits.locale_text: "Лик Ульфара озаряет пожар восходящего солнца, столь жаркое пламя сияет — аж больно смотреть. Но стоит пожару утихнуть, хоть на секунду, и тут же подложка из блеклой серости и мерзко-зеленой дымки окутывает его плечи. Никто вокруг этого не замечает..." {n}Кассия взмахивает ладонью, сбрасывая невидимую шаль с собственных плеч.{/n} "Но я вижу".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "The fire of a rising sun illuminates Ulfar's face, a blaze so incandescent it is painful to look at. But whenever the fire subsides, even for a second, at once an undercoat of dismal greyness and repulsive green haze envelops his shoulders. No one around him notices it..." {n}Cassia waves her hand, throwing an invisible shawl off her own shoulders.{/n} "But I see."
languages.original_text: "Лик Ульфара озаряет пожар восходящего солнца, столь жаркое пламя сияет — аж больно смотреть. Но стоит пожару утихнуть, хоть на секунду, и тут же подложка из блеклой серости и мерзко-зеленой дымки окутывает его плечи. Никто вокруг этого не замечает..." {n}Кассия взмахивает ладонью, сбрасывая невидимую шаль с собственных плеч.{/n} "Но я вижу".

No one around him notices it..." {n}Cassia waves her hand, throwing an invisible shawl off her own shoulders.{/n} "But I see."

languages.text: “初升太阳的火焰照亮了乌尔法的脸。这火焰是如此炽热，光是看着就令人感到疼痛不已。但只要火光消退，哪怕仅仅是一秒钟，他的肩膀上就会立刻罩上一层令人沮丧的灰色，还有令人厌恶的绿色雾气。他身边的人全都注意不到这一点……”{n}卡西娅挥着手，仿佛从肩膀上甩下了一件无形的披肩。{/n}“但我注意到了。”
languages.original_text: "The fire of a rising sun illuminates Ulfar's face, a blaze so incandescent it is painful to look at. But whenever the fire subsides, even for a second, at once an undercoat of dismal greyness and repulsive green haze envelops his shoulders. No one around him notices it..." {n}Cassia waves her hand, throwing an invisible shawl off her own shoulders.{/n} "But I see."

traits.locale_text: “初升太阳的火焰照亮了乌尔法的脸。这火焰是如此炽热，光是看着就令人感到疼痛不已。但只要火光消退，哪怕仅仅是一秒钟，他的肩膀上就会立刻罩上一层令人沮丧的灰色，还有令人厌恶的绿色雾气。他身边的人全都注意不到这一点……”{n}卡西娅挥着手，仿佛从肩膀上甩下了一件无形的披肩。{/n}“但我注意到了。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "The fire of a rising sun illuminates Ulfar's face, a blaze so incandescent it is painful to look at. But whenever the fire subsides, even for a second, at once an undercoat of dismal greyness and repulsive green haze envelops his shoulders. No one around him notices it..." {n}Cassia waves her hand, throwing an invisible shawl off her own shoulders.{/n} "But I see."

languages.text: «El fuego del sol naciente ilumina el rostro de Ulfar. Es una llama tan incandescente que mirarla resulta doloroso. Pero cuando el fuego remite, aunque sea un solo segundo, al momento un abrigo gris lúgubre y una repugnante neblina verde cubren sus hombros. Nadie a su alrededor se da cuenta...». {n}Cassia agita la mano, quitándose un chal invisible de los hombros.{/n} «Pero yo lo veo».
languages.original_text: "The fire of a rising sun illuminates Ulfar's face, a blaze so incandescent it is painful to look at. But whenever the fire subsides, even for a second, at once an undercoat of dismal greyness and repulsive green haze envelops his shoulders. No one around him notices it..." {n}Cassia waves her hand, throwing an invisible shawl off her own shoulders.{/n} "But I see."

traits.locale_text: «El fuego del sol naciente ilumina el rostro de Ulfar. Es una llama tan incandescente que mirarla resulta doloroso. Pero cuando el fuego remite, aunque sea un solo segundo, al momento un abrigo gris lúgubre y una repugnante neblina verde cubren sus hombros. Nadie a su alrededor se da cuenta...». {n}Cassia agita la mano, quitándose un chal invisible de los hombros.{/n} «Pero yo lo veo».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「朝日の炎がウルファーの顔を照らしています。その白熱する炎は、目にするだけで痛々しいほどです。ですが、その炎が一瞬でも静まるたびに、彼の肩には、禍々しい灰色と忌まわしい緑の靄が覆いかぶさるのです。周囲は誰もそれに気づいてはいません…」{n}カシアは手を振り、自分の肩から見えないショールを投げ捨てる。{/n}「ですが、私には見えるのです」
languages.original_text: "The fire of a rising sun illuminates Ulfar's face, a blaze so incandescent it is painful to look at. But whenever the fire subsides, even for a second, at once an undercoat of dismal greyness and repulsive green haze envelops his shoulders. No one around him notices it..." {n}Cassia waves her hand, throwing an invisible shawl off her own shoulders.{/n} "But I see."

traits.locale_text: 「朝日の炎がウルファーの顔を照らしています。その白熱する炎は、目にするだけで痛々しいほどです。ですが、その炎が一瞬でも静まるたびに、彼の肩には、禍々しい灰色と忌まわしい緑の靄が覆いかぶさるのです。周囲は誰もそれに気づいてはいません…」{n}カシアは手を振り、自分の肩から見えないショールを投げ捨てる。{/n}「ですが、私には見えるのです」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Die Flammen einer aufgehenden Sonne beleuchten Ulfars Gesicht, ein solch loderndes Feuer, dass es schmerzt, hineinzusehen. Doch wenn das Feuer sich legt, wenn auch nur für eine Sekunde, umhüllen sofort eine trostlose graue Schicht und ein abstoßend grüner Schimmer seine Schultern. Niemand um ihn herum bemerkt es ..." {n}Cassia wirft sich mit der Hand einen unsichtbaren Schal von den Schultern.{/n} "Aber ich sehe es."
languages.original_text: "The fire of a rising sun illuminates Ulfar's face, a blaze so incandescent it is painful to look at. But whenever the fire subsides, even for a second, at once an undercoat of dismal greyness and repulsive green haze envelops his shoulders. No one around him notices it..." {n}Cassia waves her hand, throwing an invisible shawl off her own shoulders.{/n} "But I see."

traits.locale_text: "Die Flammen einer aufgehenden Sonne beleuchten Ulfars Gesicht, ein solch loderndes Feuer, dass es schmerzt, hineinzusehen. Doch wenn das Feuer sich legt, wenn auch nur für eine Sekunde, umhüllen sofort eine trostlose graue Schicht und ein abstoßend grüner Schimmer seine Schultern. Niemand um ihn herum bemerkt es ..." {n}Cassia wirft sich mit der Hand einen unsichtbaren Schal von den Schultern.{/n} "Aber ich sehe es."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Le visage d'Ulfar est baigné dans la lumière d'un soleil levant, si incandescent qu'il est presque douloureux de le regarder. Cependant, dès que le feu s'éteint, même l'espace d'une seconde, une brume mêlant un vert répugnant et un gris lugubre vient envelopper ses épaules. Personne ne s'en rend compte... mais moi, je le vois, » {n}dit Cassia en agitant la main comme si elle retirait un châle invisible de ses propres épaules.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The fire of a rising sun illuminates Ulfar's face, a blaze so incandescent it is painful to look at. But whenever the fire subsides, even for a second, at once an undercoat of dismal greyness and repulsive green haze envelops his shoulders. No one around him notices it..." {n}Cassia waves her hand, throwing an invisible shawl off her own shoulders.{/n} "But I see."

traits.locale_text: « Le visage d'Ulfar est baigné dans la lumière d'un soleil levant, si incandescent qu'il est presque douloureux de le regarder. Cependant, dès que le feu s'éteint, même l'espace d'une seconde, une brume mêlant un vert répugnant et un gris lugubre vient envelopper ses épaules. Personne ne s'en rend compte... mais moi, je le vois, » {n}dit Cassia en agitant la main comme si elle retirait un châle invisible de ses propres épaules.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Doğan güneşin ateşi, Ulfar'ın yüzünü aydınlatıyor. Alevler öylesine parlak ki baktıkça can acıtıyor. O ateş bir an olsun söndüğündeyse Ulfar'ın omuzlarını kasvetli bir griliğe ve itici, yeşil bir sise sahip astar sarıyor. Çevresindeki kimse bunu fark etmiyor." {n}Cassia, görünmez şalını omuzlarından atarcasına elini sallıyor.{/n} "Oysa ben görüyorum."
languages.original_text: "The fire of a rising sun illuminates Ulfar's face, a blaze so incandescent it is painful to look at. But whenever the fire subsides, even for a second, at once an undercoat of dismal greyness and repulsive green haze envelops his shoulders. No one around him notices it..." {n}Cassia waves her hand, throwing an invisible shawl off her own shoulders.{/n} "But I see."

traits.locale_text: "Doğan güneşin ateşiyle Ulfar'ın yüzü aydınlanıyor. Alevler öylesine parlak ki baktıkça can acıtıyor. O ateş bir an olsun söndüğündeyse Ulfar'ın omuzlarını kasvetli bir grilik ve itici bir yeşil sis sarıyor. Çevresindeki kimse bunu fark etmiyor..." {n}Cassia, görünmez bir eşarbı omuzlarından atarcasına elini sallıyor.{/n} "Oysa ben görüyorum."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
